Text: Fucking useless. Widescreen my arse. It's stretched to widescreen. Disney's Jungle Book was never made in widescreen moron! The true ratio is 1.37:1 look it up on IMDB if you do not believe me. This encode sucks. I am STILL looking for a proper of the remastered version on DVDRip.
